programme.title: Property Virgins
programme.desc: Josh wants to buy his first property but is cautious about spending his inheritance.

programme.title: Property Virgins
programme.desc: Newlyweds Jeff and Michelle are ready to move out of her parents' basement.

programme.title: Property Virgins
programme.desc: A couple about to get married is looking for a house together at the same time.

programme.title: Property Virgins
programme.desc: Austin, Texas newlyweds, Ed and Courtney, want to buy a home where they can settle down.

programme.title: Property Virgins
programme.desc: A couple searches for a three bedroom home in San Diego that they can afford.

programme.title: Property Virgins
programme.desc: Before their wedding, Justin and Karina try to find a dream home in suburban Toronto.

programme.title: Property Virgins
programme.desc: A couple tries to find a dream home outside Toronto.

programme.title: Property Virgins
programme.desc: Flight attendant Melanie travels the world for work, but back at home, she's ready to buy her first-ever Toronto condo; she's hoping for a lake view home complete with all the perks.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: Award-winning Producer/Rapper Lil Jon has asked John and Zack to come build him a tiny recording studio right in his backyard. He's looking for something completely functional he can record his next big hit in.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: A couple plans on turning its garage into a tiny house and renting out its big house to generate extra income.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: A Minnesota couple builds a 207 sq. foot mobile prairie cottage for their family of four.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: Adam and Gabrielle don't just want a tiny house, they want one that is geared specifically toward their children.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: John and Zack head to Texas to help a family rebuild after losing their dream home in a fire; Deanna and her sons are used to living large, so she wants to build two tiny homes.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: Lauren and Liam want their already small life to become even smaller by building a nautically inspired tiny house.

programme.title: Tiny House Nation
programme.desc: John and Zack take on a rescue mission in Atlanta for Peter and Elizabeth, a couple who are struggling to finish construction on their own tiny house, are about to get married, and plan to change jobs and move to Maine all in a month's time.
